mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CANAME, CRPRICE, RECODE, RECACODE, REMID, REMNAME, REMTEL, REMEMAIL, REREQUEST, REPEOPLE, RECRNAME, RECRNUM FROM RESERVATION INNER JOIN CAMPING ON CACODE = RECACODE INNER JOIN CAMPINGROOM ON CRCACODE = CACODE AND CRNAME = RECRNAME AND CRNUM = RECRNUM WHERE REMID = #{loginId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAMPING
AND CATYPE LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'
AND CANAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, CAMPING.* FROM ( SELECT CAMPING.*, CA.CRPRICE FROM CAMPING LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C.CACODE, MIN(TO_NUMBER(CR.CRPRICE)) AS CRPRICE FROM CAMPING C LEFT OUTER JOIN CAMPINGROOM CR ON C.CACODE = CR.CRCACODE GROUP BY C.CACODE ) CA ON CAMPING.CACODE = CA.CACODE
CASTATE = 1
AND CATYPE LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'
AND CANAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY CAMPING.CACODE) CAMPING) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, QNA.* FROM ( SELECT CQ.*, C.CANAME, CW.* FROM CAMPINGQUESTION CQ INNER JOIN CAMPING C ON CQ.CQCACODE = C.CACODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CAMPINGANSWER CW ON CQ.CQCODE = CW.CWCQCODE WHERE CQCACODE =#{cacode} ORDER BY CQDATE DESC) QNA ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
